item.title: Singapore is invited to a new year countdown at Clarke Quay
item.description:
Source: Clarke Quay. Clarke Quay invites everyone in Singapore to celebrate the end of the year with exciting festivities. Popular radio DJs Glenn Ong from Class95FM and Sonia Chew from 987FM will host the New Year’s Eve countdown. The event will feature live music by the band Goodfellas, a vibrant street parade with a glow theme, and roving percussionists. The entire event at Clarke Quay will be broadcasted live on 987FM...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-is-invited-to-a-new-year-countdown-at-clarke-quay/

item.title: Celebrate the end of the year with eco-friendly festivities at East, Hong Kong
item.description:
The environmentally conscious EAST, Hong Kong hotel is ready to celebrate the holiday season this year with special decorations and exciting events. Continuing a tradition that began in 2014, EAST’s Christmas Village highlights creative recycling. This year, the EAST team gathered fallen logs left behind by Typhoon Mangkhut from the city streets to create unique Christmas decorations. Students from Jockey Club Sarah Roe School (JCSRS), the only school in Hong Kong offering an English curriculum for students with additional learning needs, collaborated with the EAST team on this project...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/celebrate-the-end-of-the-year-with-eco-friendly-festivities-at-east-hong-kong/

item.title: Grand Hyatt Mumbai reveals its plans for New Year's Eve
item.description:
The Grand Hyatt Mumbai, a premier Hyatt International property and a central hotel for Mumbai, Pune, and Goa, is hosting multiple New Year’s Eve celebrations. Starting at 7 pm, guests can enjoy the Grand Courtyard Party. This event features dancing under the stars, drinks, and desserts for INR 3,500 plus taxes. At 7 pm, several dining options are available. Soma offers North West Frontier cuisine with vegetarian and non-vegetarian choices. Celini provides Italian cuisine, while China House serves a Chinese-themed dinner...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/grand-hyatt-mumbai-reveals-its-plans-for-new-year-s-eve/

item.title: The highlight of the Downtown Dubai New Year's Eve Gala is the Burj Khalifa
item.description:
To celebrate the arrival of 2015, Dubai’s Burj Khalifa will showcase a dazzling LED display across its 828-meter height, synchronized with a spectacular fireworks show, according to a report from the Emirates News Agency, WAM. Emaar Properties, the developer behind Downtown Dubai, is orchestrating a six-part extravaganza for their New Year’s Eve Gala. The event will feature a captivating blend of fireworks, laser displays, and a light show. A highlight of the celebration will be a special tribute to Dubai, its leaders, and the UAE’s accomplishments over the past 43 years, projected onto the specially designed LED screen...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-highlight-of-the-downtown-dubai-new-year-s-eve-gala-is-the-burj-khalifa/
